title: Freedom of assembly in the UK

content.prompt: Which of the following statements best demonstrates that a healthy civil society exists in the United Kingdom?

choices.label: Groups promoting hate speech or intolerance have been permanently banned.
The House of Commons often passes laws that protect various minority groups.
The history of gradualism in the United Kingdom permits changes to the class structure to occur very slowly.
Freedom of assembly allows groups to express their discontent with the government by protesting.

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Explain how political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors apply in a course country.
